      • createGuidStringFromPublicKey

        public static java.lang.String createGuidStringFromPublicKey(byte[] keyBytes)
        Uses a hash function to generate a GUID from a public key string. This code is duplicated in client so if you change it you should change it there as well.
        Parameters:
        keyBytes -
        Returns:
        a guid string

      • createGuidStringFromBase64PublicKey

        public static java.lang.String createGuidStringFromBase64PublicKey(java.lang.String publicKey)
                                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a hexidecimal guid string by hashing a public key. The input string is assumed to base64 encoded.
        Parameters:
        publicKey -
        Returns:
        a guid string
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
